data.title: Classes, Clubs & Groups
data.text:
Find Your Friends

Update your information on The Network so you can stay in touch with classmates and students, meet other Smithies and choose how you want to receive updates from the college.

The Network

Class Websites

No matter how much time you spent at Smith, you are a member of a Smith class. Each class year has its own website, which offers news and events about your classmates and helps you stay engaged with the college.

Websites are created by and for the classes of Smith College. Information on these websites is intended for communication among Smith alums. Use of this information for any other purpose is strictly prohibited. Smith College is not responsible for the content of class websites.

Clubs & Groups

Smith Clubs

Over 100 active Smith clubs and groups around the world are powered by the energy and commitment of volunteers. Varying in size, clubs and groups allow you to bring Smith home with you—connecting you with alums and offering compelling programs and events right in your area. Join your local Smith club or group and be part of the fabric that weaves together the past, present and future of your alma mater.

Affinity & Special Interest Groups

The Office of Alumnae Relations strives to help alums connect to Smith and to one another in ways that address special interests and common bonds. Our team is currently reimagining how the Office of Alumnae Relations can best support this work.

For questions or information regarding affinity groups and programs, please contact Daisy Pereira-Tosado, director of affinity engagement, at dpereiratosado@smith.edu.

Websites are created by and for the clubs of Smith College. Information on these websites is intended for communication among Smith alums. Use of this information for any other purpose is strictly prohibited. Smith College and the Alumnae Association of Smith College are not responsible for the content of club websites.

Alum Voices

Ways to Connect

Think of it this way: by joining a group or a club in your area, you get an all-access pass to the exciting and dynamic ways you can engage with Smith.

In the News
